pageContext.claim: “Even though he's very liberal, the Governor of New Jersey, right? Do you know him? Now, listen. He said to me something that's amazing. New Jersey was very heavily hit, very hard hit, thousands of people. He said, with thousands of people that died, thousands of people, there was only one person that died under the age of 18, would you believe that?”
pageContext.analysis: Trump apparently heard this from New Jersey Gov. Murphy when they had dinner on June 12. At that point, one child -- a 4 year old -- had died of covid-19 in New Jersey. But Trump's statistic is out of date as of June 15, when the state announced that the second child had died.
